reviewText: I'm one of the many who served onboard this historical ship.  I served during the Korean War and it was an honor to serve on such a mighty ship.
Good history of the Mighty Mo
Recommend this for history buffs.  Makes you feel as if you are on board.  The comments from the men that served aboard make it very interesting as well.
Three Wars of the Battleship Missouri : Trace The 51 Year Career Of The Battleship that fought in WWII , Korean War , And The Gulf War Very good, filling in some of the history of this great ship.
My grandson is crazy about this video. We are taking him to Hawaii to visit the Missouri and this was a great introduction.
